page.title: 17Leisure and Recreation
page.content: Most people in Shenstone like sport to fill up there spare time.Most go to Lichfield to play Hockey,Squash, tennis and lots of other games. Some people like painting pictures of the view and suroundings.You can often see people sitting in their gardens or in fields, painting. Roller skating is very popular, there are often people skating down the road. Bikes are popular too. Lots of men go into pubs in their spare time. Usually the 4 pubs in Shenstone are quite full. Most of all people watch T.V in their spare time. Some people like making models out of cardboard,clay and other things. Then they paint them and put them on show. Lot's of people like gardening. The gardens are looking lovely now. Jogging is popular in Shenstone, sewing and knitting are popular too. BECKY OLIVER
